title: So THIS is bannable now??? (14 days...)
body:
Game 1
LikeMyBird: yep
LikeMyBird: xayah no mobility now
LikeMyBird: early gank this cunt
LikeMyBird: ok lee
LikeMyBird: renek stop building ad
LikeMyBird: u are behind
LikeMyBird: report renek
LikeMyBird: k
LikeMyBird: k
LikeMyBird: report renek plz tho
LikeMyBird: no building ad into jax and stilll fighting him
LikeMyBird: k
LikeMyBird: aram
LikeMyBird: dominion
LikeMyBird: 2 kill vs bots
LikeMyBird: lol tf
LikeMyBird: u suk
LikeMyBird: lee and renek fuking heavy
LikeMyBird: lol 400 ping ez
LikeMyBird: ez
LikeMyBird: renek is nor fighting or running
LikeMyBird: i dont undestand
LikeMyBird: heavy
LikeMyBird: 400 ping op
LikeMyBird: renek and lee way too heavy


PS: me and the 2 others were saying they were too heavy, and can someone tell me how to put a picture, I've screenshoted it so i can prove i didn't created the text.

PS#2 : THIS WAS A 14 DAYS BAN...

replies.body:
Again, it does not matter.

You said it, it is a reportable offense. It is offensive. It is verbal abuse.

You said it. You got the consequences.

Deal with it.
Did you have punishments prior to this? Was this your in-client reform card or the one sent to your email? (the in-client one may show more logs)
in-client
I **_hate_** when people put down teammates ("u suk") and tell me what to build. Deserved ban IMO
Twisted Fate (enemy) said they were playing coop vs ai (we were supposedly the bots) so i wrote to the 2/0/3 TF (2 kills vs bots lol tf u suk). You analysed this quote out of contexte m8.
that was always bannable though...
Doesn't matter if it was all chat or not. You still called someone a cunt, which is reportable.
was not in all chat (was asking lee to bank bot since the enemy xayah flashed away in an invade and was almost insulting us. So i just tell my lee sin to "gang this cunt".)
Or maybe it's from when you... oh idk... called someone a cunt?
was not in all chat (was asking lee to bank bot since the enemy xayah flashed away in an invade and was almost insulting us. So i just tell my lee sin to "gang this cunt".)
You were pretty much extremely toxic. I don't get why you are shocked.

Let me see.  Line 4 the C word.  
Asked for an illegit report  
F bomb

Let me just say that the decision to ban you must have been EZ.

LikeMyBird: xayah no mobility now
LikeMyBird: early gank this cunt

LikeMyBird: i dont undestand
LikeMyBird: heavy
LikeMyBird: 400 ping op
LikeMyBird: renek and lee way too heavy



I'm guessing that part is what you got banned for. Even if it wasn't much, it was still toxic...and you don't get banned for just one game, there's usually two other games where Rito Game and other players consider you to be toxic, and they *SHOULD* send you your chat logs.

> [{quoted}](name=Evêñtfûl Hôrïzôñ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PdpMvgp7,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-22T03:02:17.862+0000)

> I'm guessing that part is what you got banned for. Even if it wasn't much, it was still toxic...and you don't get banned for just one game, there's usually two other games where Rito Game and other players consider you to be toxic, and they *SHOULD* send you your chat logs.

Uh.... maybe it was the use of the word "cu**" and the call for reports?
That and, uhh, saying people suck?
Newsflash,  people actually do suck on this game.
Did I ever say the didn't? NO? Okay, what's with your stupid and pointless post?
So why should anyone be perm banned for stating the truth,it's a joke
Because it's offensive, and you can be banned for offending others. I don't think it's worthy of a perma ban, which is why it was a 14-day ban. And it's not the truth if it's a joke!
Oh dam if that's the case just report anything and everything because you felt offended. No wonder every game there is report calling because we're so fragile in this game time the slightest thing
it was a joke with the enemy TF (2-0-3) he said he was playing vs bots so i said "2 kills vs bots, lol tf u suk"
Ahh, I see. It's possible that the bots that read chat logs misinterpreted it, and thought you were saying he actually sucked.

> [{quoted}](name=Evêñtfûl Hôrïzôñ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PdpMvgp7,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2017-04-22T03:57:06.476+0000)
>
> That and, uhh, saying people suck?

I say people suck all the time and don't see any kind of punishment. :/ I mean, I'm not easily triggered to that, but after about 11 deaths in 15 minutes you know...

If people don't report you, you probably won't get banned lol...I know people can suck, but it really **doesn't** help to just say "wtf man u garbo git gud" when you can say "hey man, can you try your best to just play safe and farm up, and try to stay out of fights until a teammate comes to help". Even if they are boosted monkeys.
It's usually after the 15-20 minute mark lol I give them chances but sometimes I just ask for an ff.
was not in all chat. the enemy xayah burned her flash on our invade so i told our lee sin to early gank this "c*nt". I said it like that because she was triggering our team.
Yea but... the word is still the word. I know application should matter, but it's delivery they look at.
the card only showed 1 game

Hmm, that's odd...there's supposed to be three chat logs. Regardless, there was still some toxicity in that one chat long, and even if Riot didn't send you another log, it was possible that you were toxic in other games. (Not saying you were, just saying it's possible. :P)
Actually you get sent 1-3 recent logs. That does not mean that was all that got him punished, just that other notable ones were more than a couple days old. Support can provide others if requested.
Usually it shows 3 or 2 though...not just one.
Didn't received an e-mail in top of that. I asked them in support so they can show me all the causes.
k Rito messed up there, nobody should get banned without an e-mail message. GL (HF?) and hope Rito support doesn't fail ~~again~~!
hope so lol.... ~~again~~

You may have had previous punishments that did not stick and they had to escalate it. Remember, you have a permanent record.
If that's actually all you said, Riot's report system is pathetic and this should serve as a warning for everyone to just not use chat ever.
good job riot.  100% approve.
PS#3: This can also be permabannable. Which is your next punishment.
PS#4: NO SHIT SHERLOCK !!!

This certainly isn't the most toxic chat I've ever seen.  Frankly, I wouldn't even punish it if this were the Tribunal, I'd have to see other games but I have to assume you talk to your teammates like this regularly, which I would find pretty irritating.  

I'm guessing the reason you received a 14 day ban was because you were previously banned or chat restricted and were escalated to this level now.
chat ban a month ago

Did you have previous warnings in the form of 10-25 game chat restrictions?


If so then yes this warranted a 14 day ban.
was a month ago

Dw bird, people on here have all been "toxic" at one point... if they had it there way they'd be no players to play. He used the word cunt, so what, it wasn't directed towards that person in an offensive manner, gtfo it
